roleset.name: shoot at from an airplane
roleset.note: STRAFE-V NOTES: Based on WSJ. No VNcls. (from strafe.01-v)

example.name: bang! bang!
example.text: It can send [a fighter squadron]-1 [*-1]to strafe terrorist hideouts in the Bekaa Valley, but can't shoot Abu Nidal.
example.arg: terrorist hideouts in the Bekaa Valley
